snippet: A survey by the National Association for Business Economics, released Friday, found that economists expected growth of 3 percent at an annual rate in the second quarter.
abstract: National Assn for Business Economics survey finds economists have sharply cut their growth forecasts for the April-June quarter; predict growth of 3 percent in quarter, down from 3.5 percent in previous survey.
lead_paragraph: A survey by the National Association for Business Economics, released Friday, found that economists expected growth of 3 percent at an annual rate in the second quarter.
